title: Owner
description: Founder & Lead Consultant of a tech agency specializing in innovative web and blockchain solutions. Partnered with clients to deliver cutting edge digital products, business needs into high impact solutions. Provided end-to-end technical consulting, driving optimal performance and client satisfaction.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: Frontend Engineer at PayOnUs, where I developed dynamic, responsive web applications using React, prioritizing accessibility and user experience. Collaborated with cross-functional Agile teams, participating in sprint planning and daily stand ups to deliver scalable, high quality solutions.

title: Freelancer
description: Freelance Web Developer and Technical Consultant, delivering project management and technical consulting services to ensure timely delivery and client satisfaction. Specialize in developing custom web applications using React and collaborating closely with clients to understand their needs and deliver innovative, scalable solutions.
